attributes.action: Raise the UK national terror threat level to Severe, issue new security guidance
attributes.additional_details: Recent violent incidents in Manchester and London have increased public concern regarding the risk of further attacks. Raising the national threat level and providing updated security guidance would support preparedness and assist communities, local authorities and at-risk locations in planning appropriate protective measures. Clear information would help improve public awareness and strengthen national resilience.
attributes.background: Raise the UK national terror threat level to Severe in response to recent attacks, and issue updated security guidance for the public and for locations that may be at higher risk.

rejection.details: The Joint Terrorism Analysis Centre (JTAC) is responsible for setting the threat level for the UK from terrorism, and the threat level from Northern Ireland Related Terrorism in Northern Ireland. Find out more about the JTAC and terrorism threat levels here: https://www.mi5.gov.uk/threats-and-advice/terrorism-threat-levels
